title: Python Programming Workshop
description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming in this comprehensive workshop. Perfect for beginners who want to start their coding journey. Topics covered include variables, data types, loops, functions, and basic problem-solving techniques.
speaker: Dr. Ahmed Khan

title: Annual Sports Week Opening Ceremony
description: Join us for the grand opening ceremony of SSUET's Annual Sports Week. Featuring performances, athlete introductions, and the lighting of the sports week torch. All students are welcome to attend and show their support.
speaker: Dean of Student Affairs

title: Cultural Night 2024
description: Experience the diversity of cultures at SSUET's Cultural Night. Enjoy traditional performances, music, dance, and food from various regions. A celebration of unity in diversity.
speaker: Various Artists

title: Career Guidance Seminar
description: Get insights from industry professionals about career paths, job market trends, and essential skills for success. Q&A session included.
speaker: Industry Professionals Panel

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Intensive one-day bootcamp covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript basics, and introduction to modern web frameworks. Build your first website by the end of the day.
speaker: Prof. Sarah Ahmed

title: Debate Competition Finals
description: Watch the best debaters from different departments compete in the final round. Topics cover current affairs, technology, and social issues.
speaker: Finalists
